verbs.description: The Eagles [V: are] speaking out Wednesday for the first time after President Donald Trump disinvited the team from the White House .
[ARG0: The Eagles] are [V: speaking] out [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump disinvited the team from the White House] .
